ml_tags: close your eyes or look into your shadow Sit with me in the quiet and you’ll know that I did not leave. There is no leaving when one soul is blended with another. When I go, don’t learn to live without me just look for me in the moments. I am there. When I go don’t learn to live without me when the sun shines I will be there. just learn to live with my love in a different way. And if you need to see me Roland E Tremblay & Joan Tremblay Nov 4, 1929 Nov 30, 2023
